description:
All-in-one ebook reader

Koodo Reader is an all-in-one eBook reader for Windows, macOS, Linux, and the web, supporting over 15 formats.
Stable release candidate
This version has been selected as the candidate for the next stable release. As we keep monitoring any potential bugs that can greatly affect the user experience, we won't add any new features to our main branch before the next stable release. You can help us speed up this process by reporting bugs you encountered. Thanks for your support.
Fixed
- Reading progress won't be saved if you upgraded from 1.5.2 or lower version
- Jump to the start of the chapter when navigating the highlights and notes created by 1.5.2 or lower version.
Mirror
- Release Hosts
